leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

tools.name: loupeR
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Seurat objects to 10x Genomics Loupe Browser files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight R package designed to convert Seurat objects into .cloupe files, enabling visualization and analysis of single-cell data within the 10x Genomics Loupe Browser.

tools.name: AnnSQL
tools.one_line_profile: SQL-based query interface for AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enables SQL-based querying directly on AnnData objects, facilitating complex data filtering and retrieval operations for single-cell datasets.

tools.name: PiGx scRNAseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analysis of Drop-seq single cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for processing Drop-seq single-cell RNA-seq data, handling steps from raw reads to expression matrices and quality control reports.

tools.name: scVIDR
tools.one_line_profile: Variational inference model for predicting dose responses in single cells
tools.detailed_description: A Variational Autoencoder (VAE) tool designed to predict gene expression changes in response to chemical perturbations across different cell types in single-cell data.

tools.name: MiCV
tools.one_line_profile: Web-application for scRNA-seq filtering, analysis, and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Python Dash-based web application that allows researchers to upload raw scRNA-seq data for interactive filtering, analysis, and manual annotation without requiring extensive coding skills.

tools.name: ceLLama
tools.one_line_profile: Local LLM-based cell type annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging local Large Language Models (LLMs) for automated cell type annotation in single-cell RNA-seq data, emphasizing privacy and speed.

tools.name: scrna_seurat_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Seurat-based analysis pipeline for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A structured pipeline utilizing the Seurat framework for the comprehensive analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, covering preprocessing to downstream analysis.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Single-cell Analysis Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform and pipeline for the automated analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data, providing a user-friendly interface for processing and visualization.

tools.name: Interactive-3D-Plotting-in-Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization tool for Seurat objects
tools.detailed_description: R code and utilities to generate interactive 3D UMAP and tSNE plots from Seurat-analyzed single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: gssnng
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Set Scoring on the Nearest Neighbor Graph
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing gene set scoring on single-cell RNA-seq data using the nearest neighbor graph structure within AnnData objects.

tools.name: sc-atacseq-explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing tool for single cell ATAC-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing utility for single-cell ATAC-Seq data, designed to prepare data for visualization and analysis in single cell explorer tools.

tools.name: DoubletDetection
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection in single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for detecting doublets (technical artifacts where two cells are sequenced as one) in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ALRA
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptively-thresholded Low-Rank Approximation for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A method for imputation of missing values in single-cell RNA-seq data using low-rank approximation, helping to recover true biological signals from sparse data.

tools.name: MAGIC
tools.one_line_profile: Markov Affinity-based Graph Imputation of Cells
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for imputing missing values in high-dimensional data, particularly single-cell RNA-seq, by sharing information across similar cells to restore data structure.

tools.name: FastCAR
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Correction of Ambient RNA
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to remove ambient RNA contamination from droplet-based single-cell sequencing data, improving the accuracy of downstream analysis.

tools.name: Scasat
tools.one_line_profile: Single cell ATAC-seq preprocessing and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A complete pipeline for the preprocessing and analysis of single-cell ATAC-seq data, facilitating the study of chromatin accessibility at the single-cell level.

tools.name: alphapepttools
tools.one_line_profile: Biological interpretation tools for proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: A library for the biological interpretation of proteomics data, designed to be agnostic to the search and quantification engine used.

tools.name: DropletUtils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for handling droplet-based single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package providing utilities for handling, processing, and analyzing droplet-based single-cell data, including empty droplet detection and barcode swapping correction.

tools.name: EmptyDropsMultiome
tools.one_line_profile: Empty droplet detection for multiome datasets
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the EmptyDrops method specifically tailored for detecting and removing empty droplets in multi-omics (RNA + ATAC) single-cell datasets.

tools.name: sobolev_alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Sobolev alignment of deep probabilistic models for single cell profiles
tools.detailed_description: A method for aligning single-cell profiles using Sobolev alignment of deep probabilistic models, facilitating the comparison and integration of datasets.

tools.name: scMiko
tools.one_line_profile: R package for scRNA-seq analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: An R package built on the Seurat framework offering a collection of analytic workflows and visualization tools for single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: scAR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for ambient signal removal
tools.detailed_description: scAR (single-cell Ambient Remover) uses deep learning to model and remove ambient RNA signals in droplet-based single-cell omics data, distinguishing real signals from background noise.

tools.name: CyteType
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent LLM driven cell type annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool utilizing multi-agent Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform automated cell type annotation on single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: CyteTypeR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for CyteType cell annotation
tools.detailed_description: The R implementation/interface for the CyteType tool, enabling multi-agent LLM-driven cell type annotation within R workflows.

tools.name: MuDataSeurat
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for .h5mu files in Seurat
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to read and write .h5mu (MuData) files directly into Seurat objects, facilitating multi-omics data interoperability.

tools.name: APackOfTheClones
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of clonal expansion via circle-packing
tools.detailed_description: An R package extending scRepertoire to visualize clonal expansion in single-cell data using circle-packing layouts, providing an intuitive view of clone sizes.

tools.name: DoubleThreshold
tools.one_line_profile: Double Threshold algorithm for brain connectivity
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Double Threshold (DDT) algorithm for identifying significant functional connections in neuronal networks, filtering out noise in connectivity matrices.

tools.name: ACTINN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of ACTINN for cell type identification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the ACTINN (Automatic Cell-Types Identification using Neural Networks) method for classifying cell types in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: drug2cell
tools.one_line_profile: Gene group activity utility functions for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility for Scanpy that facilitates the analysis of drug targets or other gene groups within single-cell data, mapping drug interactions to cell types.

tools.name: scanpy_recipes
tools.one_line_profile: Aggregated analysis functions for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of generalized and aggregated analysis recipes and functions for working with AnnData and Scanpy, standardizing common workflows.

tools.name: scImpute
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate and robust imputation method for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A statistical method to accurately and robustly impute the dropout values in scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: bayNorm
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian normalization for single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: bayNorm is an R package for normalizing single-cell RNA-seq data using a Bayesian approach to infer true counts.

tools.name: scIBD
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection tool for scCAS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for detecting doublets in single-cell chromatin accessibility sequencing (scCAS) data.

tools.name: treedata
tools.one_line_profile: AnnData extension for tree-structured data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends the AnnData format to support tree-structured data, facilitating hierarchical analysis in single-cell genomics.

tools.name: scCATCH
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic annotation of cell types for scRNA-seq clusters
tools.detailed_description: An R package for automatic annotation of cell types of clusters from single-cell RNA sequencing data based on evidence-based score.

tools.name: SCopeLoomR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for Loom files compatible with SCope
tools.detailed_description: R package to create generic .loom files and extend them with other data such as SCENIC regulons, Seurat clusters and markers, compatible with the SCope viewer.

tools.name: SpatialNF
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipelines for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Nextflow pipelines for processing spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: dropseqRunner
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing droplet-based scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight pipeline for processing droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data, handling alignment and quantification.

tools.name: ddqc
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven quality control for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised, data-driven quality control method for single-cell RNA-seq that retains cell types that might be lost by standard fixed-threshold filtering.

tools.name: CpG_Me
tools.one_line_profile: WGBS pipeline for alignment and QC of DNA methylation
tools.detailed_description: A whole genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) pipeline that processes raw reads (FastQ) to CpG count matrices, including alignment and QC.

tools.name: SCeptre
tools.one_line_profile: Scanpy extension for multiplexed single-cell proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package extending Scanpy to analyze multiplexed single-cell proteomics data, handling specific normalization and QC needs.

tools.name: SgsAnnDataV2
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Seurat/Giotto/Signac/ArchR to AnnData
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to convert analysis objects from Seurat, Giotto, Signac, and ArchR into the AnnData format for interoperability.

tools.name: anndata-mcp
tools.one_line_profile: MCP interface for AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: A tool allowing retrieval of information about AnnData objects via the Model Context Protocol (MCP), facilitating integration with LLMs or other MCP-compliant systems.

tools.name: CellBender
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for removing technical artifacts from scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A software package for eliminating technical artifacts (like ambient RNA/background noise) from high-throughput single-cell RNA sequencing data using deep generative models.

tools.name: pytometry_legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Scanpy extension for flow and mass cytometry
tools.detailed_description: Extends the Scanpy framework to handle preprocessing and analysis of flow and mass cytometry data.

tools.name: mLLMCelltype
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-LLM consensus framework for cell annotation
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging multiple Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform accurate consensus-based cell type annotation for single-cell data.

tools.name: proatac
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for scATAC-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing pipeline designed for processing single-cell ATAC-seq data.

tools.name: solo

tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting doublets in single-cell RNA-seq data, often used in conjunction with scVI.

tools.name: scruff
tools.one_line_profile: Single Cell RNA-seq UMI Filtering Facilitator
tools.detailed_description: An R package for processing single-cell RNA-seq FASTQ files, performing alignment, UMI filtering, and generating count matrices.

tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for inferring co-accessibility networks from single-cell ATAC-seq data, based on the Cicero algorithm but implemented for AnnData.

tools.name: GRnnData

tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for handling and analyzing Gene Regulatory Networks (GRNs) within the AnnData framework.

tools.name: Seurat-Integrate
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for Seurat integration methods
tools.detailed_description: An R package expanding integrative analysis capabilities of Seurat by providing seamless access to popular integration methods and benchmarking tools.

tools.name: sceasy
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for single-cell data formats
tools.detailed_description: A package to facilitate conversion between different single-cell data formats (e.g., Seurat, AnnData, Loom, SingleCellExperiment).

tools.name: DoubletFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Doublet detection in scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for predicting doublets in single-cell RNA sequencing data using artificial nearest neighbors.

tools.name: bollito
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis.

tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for the analysis of single-cell epigenomics data (scATAC-seq, scDNA methylation), built on top of Scanpy.

tools.name: pytximport

tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the R tximport package, used for summarizing transcript-level estimates for gene-level analysis.

tools.detailed_description: An R package to quantify and remove ambient RNA (soup) contamination from droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Seurat: From Moving Points to Depth', a computer vision tool for depth estimation. (Note: Name collision with bioinformatics tool Seurat).

tools.name: grassp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Analysis of Subcellular/Spatial Proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for graph-based analysis of subcellular and spatial proteomics data.

tools.name: protdata

tools.detailed_description: A dataloader tool to convert common proteomics search engine outputs into the AnnData format for downstream analysis.

tools.name: gficf

tools.detailed_description: An R package to download and merge labeled single-cell RNA-seq data from the PanglaoDB database directly into Seurat objects.

tools.name: anndata (R)

tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to the Python AnnData package, allowing manipulation of annotated multivariate observation data in R.

tools.name: r-seurat-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: CLI scripts for Seurat workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts wrapping Seurat functionality for use in command-line workflows (e.g., Bioconda, Galaxy).

tools.name: scanpy-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: CLI scripts for Scanpy workflows
tools.detailed_description: Scripts for using Scanpy via command line, facilitating integration into workflow managers like Nextflow or Galaxy.

tools.name: scanpy-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow leveraging scanpy-scripts to run scalable single-cell analysis pipelines.

tools.name: SCpubr
tools.one_line_profile: Publication-ready visualizations for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package to generate high-quality, publication-ready visualizations for single-cell transcriptomics data, streamlining plotting workflows.

tools.name: dea_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing differential expression analyses (DEA) on single-cell data using Seurat.

tools.name: mixscape_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for CRISPR screen analysis with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for performing perturbation analyses of pooled CRISPR screens with scRNA-seq readout using Seurat's Mixscape.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for scRNA-seq processing with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for processing and visualizing single-cell RNA-seq data (10X or MTX) using Seurat.

tools.name: SGS
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly browser for visualizing single-cell and spatial multiomics data
tools.detailed_description: SGS is a collaborative and versatile browser designed for the visualization of single-cell and spatial multiomics data, facilitating interactive exploration of complex biological datasets.

tools.name: anndictionary

tools.detailed_description: Anndictionary provides utilities to handle collections of AnnData objects, simplifying batch processing and management of multiple single-cell datasets in Python.

tools.detailed_description: miQC provides a data-driven approach to quality control for single-cell RNA-seq data, using probabilistic models to jointly model the proportion of mitochondrial reads and the number of detected genes.

tools.name: PieParty
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to represent each cell in UMAP plots as a pie chart
tools.detailed_description: PieParty allows for the visualization of single-cell data by representing individual cells or clusters as pie charts within UMAP embeddings, useful for displaying multi-modal or compositional data per cell.

tools.name: hv-anndata
tools.one_line_profile: Holoviz interface for AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: hv-anndata provides an interface between AnnData objects and the HoloViz ecosystem, enabling interactive and high-performance visualization of large-scale single-cell data.

tools.name: infercnvpy
tools.one_line_profile: Infer copy number variation (CNV) from scRNA-seq data in Python
tools.detailed_description: Infercnvpy is a Python package designed to infer copy number variations (CNV) from single-cell RNA-seq data, fully integrated with the Scanpy ecosystem for seamless analysis.

tools.name: anndata.js
tools.one_line_profile: AnnData implementation for the browser (JavaScript/TypeScript)
tools.detailed_description: anndata.js is a TypeScript library that brings the AnnData data structure to the browser, enabling web-based tools to read, write, and manipulate single-cell data formats directly on the client side.

tools.name: MuData
tools.one_line_profile: MuData-compatible storage for Bioconductor's MultiAssayExperiment
tools.detailed_description: This R package provides functionality to interact with MuData (Multimodal Data) formats, bridging the gap between Python's MuData and R's MultiAssayExperiment ecosystems for multimodal analysis.

tools.name: cellxgene_VIP

tools.detailed_description: cellxgene_VIP is a plugin for the cellxgene viewer that extends its capabilities to generate high-resolution publication-ready plots (violin, heatmap, volcano, etc.) and perform differential expression analysis directly within the interface.

tools.name: SCISSORS
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter optimization for reclustering cell groups in Seurat
tools.detailed_description: SCISSORS optimizes parameter selection for Louvain graph-based clustering within the Seurat framework, specifically designed to help identify rare cell types by refining reclustering strategies.

tools.name: ggSCvis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizing SingleCell data using ggplot2
tools.detailed_description: ggSCvis is an R package that provides a set of functions based on ggplot2 to simplify and enhance the visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: dropEst

tools.detailed_description: dropEst is a high-performance pipeline for processing droplet-based single-cell RNA-seq data (e.g., 10x Genomics, inDrop), handling alignment, UMI counting, and quality control to generate count matrices.

tools.name: orthomap

tools.detailed_description: orthomap extracts orthologous maps from OrthoFinder/eggNOG results and calculates weighted expression data (transcriptome evolutionary index) for single-cell RNA sequencing objects.

tools.name: Juscan.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell data analysis toolkit built with Julia
tools.detailed_description: Juscan.jl is a single-cell data analysis toolkit developed in Julia, inspired by Scanpy, offering high-performance processing and analysis capabilities for scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: cirrocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Cirrocumulus is a visualization tool designed to bring single-cell data to life, supporting large-scale datasets and providing interactive exploration capabilities in the browser.

tools.name: addImg2annData

tools.detailed_description: This tool facilitates the addition of image data to StereoSeq/Stomics spatial transcriptomics datasets and supports generating Seurat RDS and Scanpy h5ad files.

tools.name: normalisr
tools.one_line_profile: Causal inference, differential expression, and co-expression for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: Normalisr is a Python package for normalization and analysis of scRNA-seq data, focusing on causal inference, differential expression, and co-expression network analysis.

tools.name: mapscvi
tools.one_line_profile: Map single cell expression data into a reference scvi latent space
tools.detailed_description: mapscvi allows mapping of new single-cell expression data into an existing reference scVI latent space and UMAP using R and Seurat, facilitating data integration and projection.

tools.name: scVI.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for fitting VAEs to single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: scVI.jl is a Julia implementation of the scVI (single-cell Variational Inference) model, using count distributions to fit Variational Autoencoders to single-cell data.

tools.name: SignacX
tools.one_line_profile: Cell Type Identification and Discovery for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: SignacX is an R package designed for the identification and discovery of cell types in single-cell RNA-seq data, leveraging neural networks for classification.

tools.name: slide_snake

tools.detailed_description: slide_snake is a Snakemake pipeline for the preprocessing, alignment, quality control, and quantification of spatial transcriptomics data, supporting both short-read and long-read technologies.

tools.name: metaspace-converter

tools.detailed_description: A utility to download and convert datasets from METASPACE (spatial metabolomics) into common single-cell and spatial formats like AnnData or SpatialData for downstream analysis.

tools.name: cafe

tools.detailed_description: CAFE (Cell Analyzer for Flow Experiment) is a Python tool for analyzing flow cytometry data, which is closely related to single-cell analysis workflows.

tools.name: ReductionWrappers

tools.detailed_description: ReductionWrappers provides R wrappers to interface with Python-based dimensional reduction tools, allowing them to be used seamlessly with R single-cell objects like Seurat and SingleCellExperiment.

tools.name: scRNAimputeR
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scRNA imputation methods for R
tools.detailed_description: scRNAimputeR aims to collect various scRNA-seq imputation methods and provide interfaces to common R single-cell libraries like Seurat and SingleCellAssay.

tools.name: seurat-disk

tools.detailed_description: SeuratDisk provides support for on-disk storage of single-cell datasets using HDF5-based formats (like h5Seurat and AnnData), enabling analysis of datasets larger than memory within the Seurat ecosystem.

tools.name: ArchR-h5ad
tools.one_line_profile: Parse ArchR arrow files to AnnData h5ad format

tools.name: torch-adata
tools.one_line_profile: Create PyTorch Datasets from AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: torch-adata simplifies the process of creating PyTorch Dataset objects directly from AnnData files, streamlining the pipeline for deep learning applications on single-cell data.

tools.name: NASQAR
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for high-throughput sequencing data analysis
tools.detailed_description: NASQAR is a comprehensive web-based platform that offers a suite of tools for the analysis and visualization of high-throughput sequencing data, including bulk and single-cell RNA-seq.

tools.name: SeuratWizard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based wizard for guided Seurat analysis
tools.detailed_description: SeuratWizard is an interactive web application that guides users through the single-cell RNA-seq analysis workflow using Seurat, making the analysis accessible to users without extensive coding experience.

tools.name: Seurat v3 Wizard

tools.detailed_description: A web-based interactive application designed to perform guided single-cell RNA-seq data analysis and clustering based on the Seurat v3 workflow. It provides a wizard-style interface to facilitate the analysis process without requiring extensive coding.

tools.name: BurgerTools

tools.detailed_description: A bundle of useful single-cell RNA-seq gating tools that extend the functionality of Seurat. It includes utilities for cell selection and filtering based on expression thresholds.

tools.name: adpbulk

tools.name: anntools

tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface toolkit for interacting with and manipulating AnnData objects, facilitating file handling and basic operations without writing Python scripts.

tools.name: scRNA-Seq-TCC-prep

tools.name: scDblFinder

tools.detailed_description: An R package providing methods for detecting doublets (two cells captured as one) in single-cell sequencing data, improving downstream analysis quality.

tools.detailed_description: A tool for robust and accurate single-cell sequencing doublet detection that works by maximizing the Area Under the Precision-Recall Curve (AUPRC).

tools.name: ascend

tools.detailed_description: An R package for the analysis of single-cell expression data, including functions for normalization, quality control, and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: BANKSY
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial clustering algorithm unifying cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for spatial transcriptomics analysis that provides a spatial clustering algorithm unifying cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation.

tools.name: scplotter

tools.detailed_description: An R package built upon plotthis that provides a set of functions to visualize single-cell sequencing data efficiently.

tools.name: DeepSpot

tools.name: precellar

tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based package designed for high-performance preprocessing of single-cell genomics data.

tools.name: iCellR

tools.detailed_description: An interactive R package designed to facilitate the analysis and visualization of high-throughput single-cell sequencing data, supporting scRNA-seq, scVDJ-seq, scATAC-seq, CITE-Seq, and Spatial Transcriptomics.

tools.name: SCnorm

tools.name: Symphony

tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping query single-cell data onto reference atlases constructed with Harmony, enabling rapid annotation and integration.

tools.name: HyperTMO
tools.one_line_profile: Hypergraph convolutional network for multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A trusted multi-omics integration framework based on Hypergraph convolutional networks for patient classification and data integration.

tools.name: mixedCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse CCA for mixed data types
tools.detailed_description: R package for sparse canonical correlation analysis designed to handle mixed data types (continuous, binary, zero-truncated), suitable for integrating diverse omics data.

tools.name: cca_zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for Canonical Correlation Analysis methods
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Regularized, Deep Learning based, Kernel, and Probabilistic CCA methods implemented in a scikit-learn style framework, facilitating multi-view data analysis.

tools.name: autoencodix
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoder framework for multi-omics data integration
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing autoencoders for the integration of multi-omics data, enabling dimensionality reduction and feature extraction across modalities.

tools.name: longCombat
tools.one_line_profile: Longitudinal ComBat for batch effect correction
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing longitudinal ComBat, a method for harmonizing multi-batch longitudinal data while preserving biological trends.

tools.name: ODG
tools.one_line_profile: Omics Database Generator integration toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for integrating and managing omics data, facilitating the generation of databases for multi-omics analysis.

tools.name: scbean
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools for single-cell data analysis, including methods for integration and removal of batch effects.

tools.name: SCALEX
tools.one_line_profile: Online single-cell data integration via common cell-embedding space
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for online integration of single-cell data by projecting heterogeneous datasets into a common cell-embedding space, handling batch effects without retraining.

tools.name: BEER
tools.one_line_profile: Batch EffEct Remover for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to remove batch effects from single-cell data, facilitating the integration of datasets from different sources.

tools.name: MATCHER
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold Alignment for integrating single cell transcriptomic and epigenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for integrating single-cell transcriptomic and epigenomic data using manifold alignment to characterize experimental relationships.

tools.name: scgenetics
tools.one_line_profile: Identifying disease critical cell types and programs from scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing single-cell RNA-seq data to identify disease-critical cell types and genetic programs.

tools.name: conos
tools.one_line_profile: Joint analysis of multiple single-cell RNA-seq datasets
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the integration and joint analysis of multiple single-cell RNA-seq datasets, relying on graph-based connectivity.

tools.name: clonealign
tools.one_line_profile: Integrating scRNA-seq and scDNA-seq for clone-specific expression inference
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian method to infer clone-specific gene expression by integrating single-cell RNA-seq and single-cell DNA-seq data.

tools.name: MIDAS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for mosaic single-cell multimodal data integration
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the MIDAS algorithm (Nature Biotechnology 2024) for integrating single-cell multimodal data. It handles mosaic integration, imputation, and batch correction across different modalities.

tools.name: DeepProg
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for multi-omic and survival data integration
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed to integrate multi-omics data with survival outcomes. It uses autoencoders to extract features and predict patient survival, facilitating biomarker discovery.

tools.name: Cirrocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization platform for large-scale single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool that enables interactive exploration of large-scale single-cell datasets. It supports various data formats and provides a web-based interface for viewing embeddings, gene expression, and metadata.

tools.name: BenchmarkST
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for spatial transcriptomics analysis methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating clustering, alignment, and integration methods in spatial transcriptomics. It provides metrics and datasets to assess the performance of various computational tools.

tools.name: FIRM
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible integration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data for large-scale multi-tissue cell atlas datasets
tools.detailed_description: FIRM is an algorithm designed for the integration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data, specifically optimized for large-scale multi-tissue cell atlas datasets to handle batch effects and align populations.

tools.name: CLEAR
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised contrastive learning for integrative single-cell RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: CLEAR leverages self-supervised contrastive learning to perform integrative analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data, aiming to overcome batch effects and learn robust representations.

tools.name: seuratv3wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based interactive wizard for Seurat v3 single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A version of the SeuratWizard specifically tailored for Seurat v3 workflows, enabling guided analysis and clustering of single-cell transcriptomics data.

tools.name: pyPARAGON
tools.one_line_profile: PAgeRAnk-flux on Graphlet-guided network for multi-Omic data integratioN
tools.detailed_description: A tool for multi-omic data integration and network inference that utilizes PageRank-flux algorithms on graphlet-guided networks to uncover biological relationships.

tools.name: scdownstream
tools.one_line_profile: A single cell transcriptomics pipeline for QC, integration and reporting
tools.detailed_description: An nf-core pipeline designed for downstream analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, covering quality control, data integration, and report generation.

tools.name: knncmi
tools.one_line_profile: Estimation of conditional mutual information using nearest neighbors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for estimating mutual information (MI) and conditional mutual information (CMI) using k-nearest neighbors, widely used in scientific data analysis for network inference and dependency detection.

tools.name: CGCCP_2023
tools.one_line_profile: scVI extension for unspliced RNA analysis
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of an extension to the scVI model specifically for handling unspliced RNA in single-cell sequencing data, enabling kinetic modeling and velocity analysis.

tools.name: amLDS
tools.one_line_profile: Aligned mixture of latent dynamical systems for manifold alignment
tools.detailed_description: Implements the 'Aligned mixture of latent dynamical systems' (amLDS) model for probabilistic manifold alignment, particularly useful for decoding stimuli and aligning neural dynamics across different subjects.

tools.name: ManifoldAlignment
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold Alignment algorithms implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of manifold alignment algorithms, which are techniques used to align datasets from different domains (e.g., different modalities or batches) into a shared low-dimensional space.

tools.name: FoF
tools.one_line_profile: Focus-oriented Representation Learning and Multi-view Cross-modal Alignment for Glioma Grading
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for glioma grading that employs focus-oriented representation learning and multi-view cross-modal alignment to integrate medical imaging data.

tools.name: fscca
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Fast Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis (fscca) using NIPALS SCCA and Rcpp, providing efficient multi-view data integration capabilities.

tools.name: ennemi
tools.one_line_profile: Easy Nearest Neighbor Estimation of Mutual Information
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for fast and accurate estimation of mutual information between continuous variables using nearest neighbor methods, suitable for analyzing dependencies in scientific data.

tools.name: symphonypy
tools.one_line_profile: Python port of the Symphony algorithm for single-cell reference mapping
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Symphony algorithm, enabling efficient mapping of query single-cell datasets onto integrated reference atlases.

tools.name: Banksy_py
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial clustering algorithm unifying cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation
tools.detailed_description: BANKSY is a spatial clustering algorithm that unifies cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation for spatial transcriptomics analysis.

tools.name: scAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based tool for alignment and integration of single cell genomic data
tools.detailed_description: scAlign is a deep learning-based tool for alignment and integration of single cell genomic data across multiple datasets, species, conditions, and batches.

tools.name: PASTE
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments
tools.detailed_description: PASTE (Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments) is a method for aligning and integrating spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: PASTE2
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments v.2
tools.detailed_description: PASTE2 is the second version of the Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments tool.

tools.name: SMAI
tools.one_line_profile: Alignability testing and integration of single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: SMAI provides methods for alignability testing and integration of single-cell data.

tools.name: GCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis (GCCA), useful for multi-view data integration.

tools.name: MOFAcellulaR
tools.one_line_profile: Infer multicellular programs from single-cell data using MOFA
tools.detailed_description: R package to infer multicellular programs from single-cell data using multi-omics factor analysis (MOFA).

tools.name: EMOGI
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable multi-omics graph integration method
tools.detailed_description: EMOGI is an explainable multi-omics graph integration method based on graph convolutional networks to predict cancer genes.

tools.name: Alleloscope
tools.one_line_profile: Allele-specific copy number estimation for single cell DNA and ATAC
tools.detailed_description: Alleloscope is a method for allele-specific copy number estimation applied to single cell DNA and ATAC sequencing data, allowing integrative multi-omic analysis.

tools.name: OmicsPLS
tools.one_line_profile: High dimensional data analysis and integration with O2PLS
tools.detailed_description: OmicsPLS is an R package for high dimensional data analysis and integration using the O2PLS method.

tools.name: deepcca
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis (DCCA) for learning non-linear transformations of two views.

tools.name: MARIO (mario-py)
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell proteomic data matching and integration tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of MARIO for integrating single-cell proteomic data using both shared and distinct features to perform matching and alignment.

tools.name: harmonypy
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Harmony single-cell integration algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python port of the Harmony algorithm for integrating multiple high-dimensional datasets (e.g., scRNA-seq) by projecting them into a shared embedding and correcting for batch effects using fuzzy k-means.

tools.name: scGeneFit-python
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic marker selection using linear programming
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for selecting gene markers from single-cell gene expression data using linear programming to optimize recoverability of cell labels.

tools.name: scAI
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised integrative analysis of single-cell multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the unsupervised integration of single-cell multi-omics data (e.g., scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq) to identify cell subpopulations and infer regulatory relationships.

tools.name: SingCellaR
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative analysis tool for large-scale scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the processing, analysis, and visualization of large-scale single-cell RNA-sequencing data, including clustering and trajectory analysis.

tools.name: Multigrate
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omic data integration for single-cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for integrating paired single-cell multi-omics data, learning joint representations for downstream analysis.

tools.name: scArches
tools.one_line_profile: Reference mapping and transfer learning for single-cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for mapping new single-cell query datasets onto reference atlases without retraining, enabling efficient data integration and annotation transfer.

tools.name: scGen
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell perturbation prediction using variational autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: A generative model to predict single-cell gene expression responses to perturbations (e.g., drugs, infections) by learning from control and treated conditions.

tools.name: scib
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for single-cell data integration methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library of metrics and pipelines for evaluating the performance of single-cell data integration methods, assessing both batch correction and biological conservation.

tools.name: sCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis (sCCA) implementation
tools.detailed_description: An R implementation of Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis, a statistical method often used for integrating multi-view biological data.

tools.name: TCGAplot
tools.one_line_profile: R package for pan-cancer multi-omics analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R toolkit for performing pan-cancer differential expression analysis, correlation analysis (gene expression vs TMB/MSI/TIME), and visualization of multi-omics data from TCGA.

tools.name: BERMUDA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for scRNA-seq batch effect removal
tools.detailed_description: BERMUDA (Batch Effect ReMoval Using Deep Autoencoders) is a transfer-learning-based method designed to correct batch effects in single-cell RNA sequencing data by aligning cell populations across batches.

tools.name: Vitessce
tools.one_line_profile: Visual integration tool for spatial single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A visual integration tool for exploration of spatial single-cell experiments, supporting various data formats and enabling interactive visualization of spatial and genomic data.

tools.name: scviR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for scvi-tools
tools.detailed_description: An experimental interface allowing R users to access scvi-tools, a popular Python library for deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell omics data.

tools.name: LIGER
tools.one_line_profile: R package for integrating multiple single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: LIGER (Linked Inference of Genomic Experimental Relationships) is an R package for integrating and analyzing multiple single-cell datasets, enabling joint analysis of different datasets or modalities.

tools.name: PyLiger
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of LIGER for single-cell integration
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for integrating and analyzing multiple single-cell datasets, serving as the Python implementation of the LIGER method.

tools.name: scstGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal integration for spatial gene expression prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method based on Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) and pathology image large models to predict single-cell resolution spatial gene expression by integrating multimodal information.

tools.name: CST
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-species epileptic seizure detection via multi-space alignment
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for epileptic seizure detection that leverages canine EEG data to help human analysis through cross-species and cross-modality alignment.

tools.name: CODA
tools.one_line_profile: Unified tool for spatial transcriptomics alignment and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for spatial transcriptomics that performs nonlinear alignment, common domain detection, and spatial differential gene analysis.

tools.name: MOVICS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics integration and Visualization in Cancer Subtyping
tools.detailed_description: An R package for multi-omics integration and visualization, specifically designed for cancer subtyping analysis.

tools.name: STAIG
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Transcriptomics Analysis via Image-Aided Graph Contrastive Learning
tools.detailed_description: A method for deciphering and alignment-free integration of spatial transcriptomics data using image-aided graph contrastive learning.

tools.name: bbknnR
tools.one_line_profile: R wrapper for Batch Balanced KNN (BBKNN)
tools.detailed_description: An R wrapper for the BBKNN (Batch Balanced k-Nearest Neighbors) Python package, used for fast batch effect correction in single-cell data.

tools.name: STAligner
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomics alignment and integration tool
tools.detailed_description: A graph attention auto-encoder based method for the alignment and integration of spatially resolved transcriptomics data across multiple slices.

tools.name: ElPiGraph.R
tools.one_line_profile: R package for constructing Elastic Principal Graphs to model complex data structures
tools.detailed_description: ElPiGraph.R is an R implementation of the Elastic Principal Graph algorithm, used for approximating data manifolds and inferring branching trajectories in single-cell data analysis.

tools.name: BAVARIA
tools.one_line_profile: Batch-adversarial variational auto-encoder for scATAC-seq integration
tools.detailed_description: BAVARIA is a deep learning method that uses a batch-adversarial variational auto-encoder to simultaneously perform dimensionality reduction and batch effect correction for single-cell ATAC-seq data.

tools.name: PAGANI-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Software package for pathway-based analysis and network integration
tools.detailed_description: PAGANI (Pathway Activity Guided Analysis Network Integration) is a toolkit designed for identifying dysregulated pathways and analyzing biological networks, often used in the context of complex disease analysis.

tools.name: Tempora
tools.one_line_profile: Pathway-based trajectory inference for time-series scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: Tempora is an R package that infers cell trajectories from time-series single-cell RNA sequencing data by using pathway enrichment scores, enabling biological interpretation of developmental processes.

tools.name: cell2fate
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for RNA velocity and cell fate prediction
tools.detailed_description: cell2fate is a probabilistic framework that infers RNA velocity modules to predict cell fates and integrates with spatial and regulatory models for comprehensive single-cell analysis.

tools.name: simCAS
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding-based simulator for single-cell chromatin accessibility data
tools.detailed_description: simCAS is a method for simulating single-cell chromatin accessibility sequencing (scATAC-seq) data using an embedding-based approach to preserve biological heterogeneity in generated datasets.

tools.name: scLKME
tools.one_line_profile: Landmark-based multi-cellular sample embedding generator
tools.detailed_description: scLKME is a computational approach that generates embeddings for multi-cellular samples from single-cell data using a landmark-based kernel method, facilitating sample-level analysis.

tools.name: AI4CellFate
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for cell fate prediction
tools.detailed_description: AI4CellFate utilizes deep learning techniques to predict and interpret cell fate decisions from single-cell data, providing insights into developmental trajectories.

tools.name: GRA (David's Slingshot)
tools.one_line_profile: Coordination framework for LLM-based data synthesis
tools.detailed_description: GRA (David's Slingshot) is a strategic coordination framework that enables small Large Language Models (LLMs) to match the performance of large LLMs in data synthesis tasks.

tools.name: cellDancer
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for RNA velocity inference
tools.detailed_description: cellDancer is a deep learning-based tool designed to infer RNA velocity from single-cell RNA sequencing data, modeling the kinetics of gene expression to predict future cell states.

tools.name: simulation-comparison
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for benchmarking scRNA-seq simulators
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to systematically benchmark and compare various single-cell RNA-seq data simulation methods.

tools.name: scELMo
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based embeddings for single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: scELMo leverages embeddings from Large Language Models to improve feature representation and learning for single-cell data analysis tasks.

tools.name: veloviz
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-velocity informed embedding visualization
tools.detailed_description: veloviz creates low-dimensional embeddings that respect the RNA velocity vector field, providing a visualization of cellular trajectories that is consistent with the inferred dynamics.

tools.name: scDEED
tools.one_line_profile: Detector for dubious single-cell embeddings
tools.detailed_description: scDEED (Single-cell Dubious Embedding Detector) is a statistical method for identifying distortions and unreliable regions in non-linear embeddings of single-cell data.

tools.name: Multiscale PHATE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-resolution embedding and clustering for high-dimensional data
tools.detailed_description: Multiscale PHATE extends the PHATE algorithm to learn representations at multiple levels of resolution, enabling the exploration of data structure from fine to coarse grains.

tools.name: PHATE
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction for visualizing high-dimensional data
tools.detailed_description: PHATE (Potential of Heat-diffusion for Affinity-based Transition Embedding) is a dimensionality reduction method specifically designed to visualize high-dimensional biological data while preserving both local and global structures.

tools.name: phateR
tools.one_line_profile: R implementation of PHATE dimensionality reduction
tools.detailed_description: phateR provides the R interface for the PHATE algorithm, allowing R users to perform dimensionality reduction and visualization of high-dimensional single-cell data.

tools.name: scGraph2Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for gene embedding in single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: scGraph2Vec uses a variational graph autoencoder (VGAE) to learn gene embeddings from single-cell omics data (scRNA-seq or scATAC-seq), capturing gene-gene relationships.

tools.name: scFates
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable suite for tree inference and pseudotime analysis
tools.detailed_description: scFates is a Python library for inferring tree-like trajectories and performing advanced pseudotime analysis on single-cell RNA-seq data, scalable to large datasets.

tools.name: RecursiveConsensusClustering
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised clustering algorithm for subtype discovery
tools.detailed_description: Recursive Consensus Clustering (RCC) is an algorithm designed to discover novel subtypes from bulk and single-cell transcriptomic datasets through an unsupervised recursive approach.

tools.name: Sceptic
tools.one_line_profile: Pseudotime analysis tool for time-series single-cell sequencing and imaging data
tools.detailed_description: Sceptic is designed for pseudotime analysis in single-cell studies, capable of handling both sequencing and imaging time-series data to infer developmental trajectories.

tools.name: Matilda
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task framework for learning from single-cell multimodal omics data
tools.detailed_description: Matilda leverages multi-modality information in single-cell omics data to simultaneously perform data simulation, dimension reduction, visualization, classification, and feature selection using a neural network.

tools.name: SnapCCESS
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble deep learning of embeddings for clustering multimodal single-cell omics data
tools.detailed_description: SnapCCESS utilizes ensemble deep learning techniques to generate embeddings specifically optimized for clustering multimodal single-cell omics datasets.

tools.name: VeloSim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of single cell RNA sequencing data for RNA velocity benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: VeloSim simulates single cell RNA sequencing data including unspliced/spliced counts and RNA velocity to benchmark computational methods for trajectory and velocity inference.

tools.name: scTAG
tools.one_line_profile: ZINB-based Graph Embedding Autoencoder for scRNA-seq Interpretations
tools.detailed_description: scTAG is a deep learning framework combining ZINB model and graph embedding autoencoder to learn representations for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis.

tools.name: VIA
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based trajectory inference algorithm for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: VIA (Variational Inference Analysis) is a trajectory inference tool that uses lazy-teleporting random walks to reconstruct cellular differentiation pathways and pseudotime.

tools.name: UniTVelo
tools.one_line_profile: Temporally Unified RNA Velocity for single cell trajectory inference
tools.detailed_description: UniTVelo provides a statistical framework for RNA velocity inference that models the dynamics of gene expression to infer cell trajectories and developmental time.

tools.name: DepecheR
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering of cytometry and scRNA-seq data using penalized k-means
tools.detailed_description: DepecheR is an R package for clustering high-dimensional biological data like cytometry and single-cell RNA-seq, identifying minimal sets of markers for cluster definition.

tools.name: spVelo
tools.one_line_profile: RNA velocity inference for multi-batch spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: spVelo extends RNA velocity analysis to spatial transcriptomics, specifically addressing challenges in multi-batch data integration and spatial dynamics inference.

tools.name: SoptSC
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised inference of clustering, lineage, and pseudotime from scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: SoptSC is a MATLAB-based toolkit for single-cell data analysis, offering functions for clustering, cell lineage reconstruction, pseudotime estimation, and cell-cell communication inference.

tools.name: Cassiopeia
tools.one_line_profile: Reconstruction of single-cell lineage trees from Cas9-enabled tracing data
tools.detailed_description: Cassiopeia is a suite of tools for processing and reconstructing phylogeny-like lineage trees from single-cell lineage tracing experiments using Cas9-induced mutations.

tools.name: FastProject
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction and visualization for single cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: FastProject analyzes single-cell RNA-seq data using various dimensionality reduction methods to identify biological signatures and visualize data structure.

tools.name: LinRace
tools.one_line_profile: Single cell lineage reconstruction using paired lineage barcode and expression data
tools.detailed_description: LinRace integrates lineage barcode information with gene expression data to reconstruct cell lineages in single-cell studies.

tools.name: tGPLVM
tools.one_line_profile: Nonparametric generative model for manifold learning with scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: tGPLVM implements a Gaussian Process Latent Variable Model specifically adapted for manifold learning and dimensionality reduction in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: PAGAN2
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple sequence aligner for biological sequences
tools.detailed_description: PAGAN2 is a multiple sequence alignment tool designed to extend existing alignments with new sequences, useful in phylogenetic analysis.

tools.name: cytopath
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based trajectory inference from RNA velocity fields
tools.detailed_description: Cytopath is a method for trajectory inference that accounts for the uncertainty of RNA velocity fields by performing simulations. It infers differentiation trajectories in single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: ElPiGraph.M
tools.one_line_profile: Elastic Principal Graphs for data approximation and manifold learning
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Elastic Principal Graphs (ElPiGraph) method, used for approximating data manifolds and inferring branching trajectories in high-dimensional data, such as single-cell data.

tools.name: Palantiri
tools.one_line_profile: Seismological Backprojection array tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for seismological backprojection analysis, used to image earthquake rupture processes using seismic array data.

tools.name: velodyn
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamical systems methods for RNA velocity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing dynamical systems methods for analyzing RNA velocity, providing a theoretical framework and tools for inferring cellular dynamics from single-cell transcriptomics.

tools.name: multiPhATE
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput phage genome annotation and processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for high-throughput processing and annotation of bacteriophage genomes, integrating multiple gene finding and annotation tools (like PhATE).

tools.name: wave_clus
tools.one_line_profile: Spike detection and sorting using wavelets and super-paramagnetic clustering
tools.detailed_description: A fast and unsupervised algorithm/tool for spike detection and sorting in neural recording data, utilizing wavelet transform for feature extraction and super-paramagnetic clustering.

tools.name: dbMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based dimensionality reduction and clustering
tools.detailed_description: A dimensionality reduction approach based on diffusion harmonics and graph layouts, designed to preserve global structure in high-dimensional data such as single-cell transcriptomics.

tools.name: bulkPseudotime
tools.one_line_profile: Pseudotime analysis tool for bulk RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to perform pseudotime analysis on bulk RNA-sequencing data, allowing for the inference of dynamic processes or temporal ordering from bulk samples.

tools.name: JAE
tools.one_line_profile: Joint autoencoder for single-cell multi-omics embedding
tools.detailed_description: JAE (Joint AutoEncoder) is a method for single-cell joint embedding and modality prediction. It utilizes autoencoders to integrate information from different modalities in single-cell data.

tools.name: slingshot
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for inferring cell lineages and pseudotimes from single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Slingshot provides functions for identifying and characterizing continuous developmental trajectories in single-cell sequencing data. It is a flexible and robust method for inferring cell lineages and pseudotime.

tools.name: velocycle
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian model for RNA velocity estimation of periodic manifolds
tools.detailed_description: Velocycle is a Bayesian model designed for estimating RNA velocity specifically in the context of periodic manifolds (e.g., cell cycle), improving velocity estimates for cycling cell populations.

tools.name: corral
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction and batch integration for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Corral is an R package for dimensionality reduction and batch integration of single-cell data, focusing on correspondence analysis to address batch effects and data heterogeneity.

tools.name: CellTagR
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis toolkit for CellTagging lineage tracing data
tools.detailed_description: CellTagR is an R package for the analysis of CellTagging data, supporting clone calling and lineage reconstruction to track cell fate and dynamics.

tools.name: pyslingshot
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Slingshot trajectory inference algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Slingshot algorithm, enabling users to perform trajectory inference and pseudotime estimation within Python-based single-cell analysis workflows.

tools.name: scPrisma
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral analysis method for pseudotime reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: scPrisma is a spectral analysis method for single-cell data, designed for pseudotime reconstruction, inference of informative genes, and enhancement of cyclic signals such as the cell cycle.

tools.name: Scarf
tools.one_line_profile: Memory-efficient toolkit for atlas-scale single-cell RNA-Seq and ATAC-Seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for highly memory-efficient analysis of single-cell RNA-Seq, scATAC-Seq, and CITE-Seq data. It enables the analysis of atlas-scale datasets with millions of cells on standard hardware (e.g., laptops) by utilizing memory mapping and efficient graph-based methods.

tools.name: scGBM

tools.name: SIMBA

tools.detailed_description: SIMBA (SIngle-cell eMBedding Along with features) is a graph embedding method that jointly embeds cells and features (genes, peaks, etc.) into a shared latent space, facilitating multi-omics integration and analysis.

tools.name: 4D-Cell

tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for predicting cellular identities by leveraging trajectory inference and cell fate information, likely implementing a specific algorithm for cell fate prediction.

tools.name: Pyro-Velocity

tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic framework for modeling RNA velocity, leveraging deep generative models (Pyro) to estimate uncertainty in velocity vector fields and cell fate predictions.

tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping cells across different data representations or datasets using k-Nearest Neighbors (k-NN) to transfer labels, embeddings, and expression values.

tools.detailed_description: A tool for reconstructing ancestry trees and inferring lineage relationships, accounting for incomplete lineage sorting, applicable in population genetics and phylogenetics.

tools.name: velorama

tools.detailed_description: A method for inferring gene regulatory networks (GRNs) by utilizing dynamic information from RNA velocity and pseudotime data.

tools.name: ViScore

tools.detailed_description: ViScore is a toolkit designed for evaluating and benchmarking dimensionality reduction methods in single-cell data analysis, providing metrics to assess preservation of local and global structures.

tools.detailed_description: ViVAE is a toolkit for dimensionality reduction of single-cell data using Variational Autoencoders (VAE), designed to capture complex non-linear relationships in high-dimensional data.

tools.name: scBiG

tools.detailed_description: scBiG is a representation learning tool for single-cell gene expression data that utilizes bipartite graph embedding to capture gene-cell relationships and improve clustering or downstream analysis.

tools.name: HiCFoundation
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for chromatin architecture analysis
tools.detailed_description: A generalizable Hi-C foundation model for chromatin architecture, single-cell, and multi-omics analysis across species, enabling prediction and enhancement of chromatin contact maps.

tools.name: CellPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained cell language model for single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model framework for pre-training cell language models to handle single-cell data analysis tasks, leveraging large-scale transcriptomic data.

tools.name: scDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Conditional diffusion generative model for single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A general single-cell analysis framework utilizing conditional diffusion generative models for tasks like data generation, imputation, and enhancement.

tools.name: scMoFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for single-cell multimodal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based deep learning framework for single-cell multimodal prediction and integration, enabling the translation between different omics modalities.

tools.name: PRnet
tools.one_line_profile: Perturbation-conditioned generative model for transcriptional response
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and scalable perturbation-conditioned generative model predicting transcriptional responses to unseen complex perturbations at bulk and single-cell levels.

tools.name: scMulan
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask generative pre-trained language model for single-cell
tools.detailed_description: A multitask generative pre-trained language model designed for various single-cell analysis tasks, capable of handling multiple modalities and downstream applications.

tools.name: Spatialformer
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial representation learning model for single-cell spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed to learn spatial representations from single-cell spatial transcriptomics data, likely utilizing Transformer architectures for spatial pattern recognition.

tools.name: SCDRHA
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction algorithm for scRNA-seq based on Hierarchical Autoencoder
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based dimensionality reduction method for single-cell RNA sequencing data using a hierarchical autoencoder architecture.

tools.name: scGMAAE
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian mixture adversarial autoencoder for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A generative model combining Gaussian mixture models and adversarial autoencoders for analyzing single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: SIGEL
tools.one_line_profile: Context-aware genomic language model for gene spatial expression imputation
tools.detailed_description: A genomic language model designed for spatial expression imputation, pattern detection, and function discovery in spatial transcriptomics.

tools.name: bulk2space
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial deconvolution method converting bulk transcriptomes to spatial profiles
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based spatial deconvolution method that converts bulk transcriptomes into spatially resolved single-cell expression profiles.

tools.name: PertEval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation suite for transcriptomic perturbation effect prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking and evaluation suite for models predicting transcriptomic perturbation effects, including support for single-cell foundation models.

tools.name: RAxML_Astral_trees
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for generating Astral-III species trees from UCE data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow script to generate Astral-III species trees from gene trees generated by RAxML using Ultraconserved Elements (UCE) data from the Phyluce pipeline.

tools.name: UCell
tools.one_line_profile: Rank-based gene set scoring for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for calculating gene signature scores in single-cell data using Mann-Whitney U statistics, robust to data sparsity and batch effects.

tools.name: sc-foundation-eval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for single-cell foundation models
tools.detailed_description: A codebase for evaluating the performance of single-cell foundation models like scBERT and scGPT across various downstream tasks.

tools.name: scPlantLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Single-Cell Plant Generative Pre-trained model
tools.detailed_description: A generative pre-trained language model specifically designed for single-cell plant genomics data.

tools.name: stFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model that generates contextual gene representations within single-cell and spatial niches for spatial transcriptomics analysis.

tools.name: scMRA-torch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for scRNA-seq annotation with multiple references
tools.detailed_description: A robust deep learning method (scMRA) implemented in PyTorch to annotate scRNA-seq data by leveraging multiple reference datasets.

tools.name: desc
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Embedding for Single-cell Clustering
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised deep learning algorithm for clustering single-cell RNA-seq data that learns a non-linear mapping to a low-dimensional embedding space.

tools.name: Cell-Graph-Compass
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling Single Cells with Graph Structures Foundation Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for modeling single cells using graph-structured foundation models, enabling representation learning on cell graphs.

tools.name: phyluce
tools.one_line_profile: Software for Ultraconserved Elements (UCE) phylogenomics
tools.detailed_description: A software package for analyzing data collected from ultraconserved elements (UCEs) for phylogenomics, including assembly, matching, and alignment.

tools.name: PRESCIENT
tools.one_line_profile: Generative modeling of single-cell time-series differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for modeling single-cell differentiation landscapes and predicting time-series trajectories using potential energy functions.

tools.name: HyperG-VAE
tools.one_line_profile: Hypergraph VAE for scRNA-seq analysis and GRN construction
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian deep generative model utilizing hypergraphs to analyze single-cell RNA sequencing data and construct reliable gene regulatory networks (GRNs).

tools.name: helical
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for pre-trained bio foundation models on genomics and transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to facilitate the use and development of state-of-the-art pre-trained biological foundation models, specifically focusing on genomics and transcriptomics modalities for downstream analysis.

tools.name: nucleotide-transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation models for genomics and transcriptomics sequences
tools.detailed_description: A collection of foundation models pre-trained on large-scale genomic and transcriptomic sequences, enabling downstream tasks such as variant effect prediction and functional genomics.

tools.name: UCE_phyluce_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for Ultraconserved Elements (UCE) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing and analyzing Ultraconserved Elements (UCE) data, typically used for phylogenomics and evolutionary biology studies.

tools.name: scPRINT
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell foundation model for gene network inference
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model designed for single-cell data, focusing on gene network inference and other downstream tasks, leveraging large-scale pre-training.

tools.name: exceiver
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained single-cell gene expression language model
tools.detailed_description: A language model architecture adapted for single-cell gene expression data, enabling pre-training and fine-tuning for various cellular analysis tasks.

tools.name: scDEC
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative modeling and clustering for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model that simultaneously performs clustering and representation learning on single-cell genomic data.

tools.name: scSemiProfiler
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for affordable single-cell data profiling
tools.detailed_description: A computational method that uses deep generative models to provide cost-effective single-cell data generation and profiling for large-scale disease cohorts.

tools.name: bigcarp
tools.one_line_profile: Masked language models for biosynthetic gene clusters
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing masked language models specifically trained on biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) to aid in mining and analysis of secondary metabolites.

tools.name: scNODE
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for temporal single-cell transcriptomic prediction
tools.detailed_description: A generative model that uses Neural Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) to predict temporal dynamics and trajectories in single-cell transcriptomic data.

tools.name: PULSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for multi-scale and multicellular biology
tools.detailed_description: PULSAR is a foundation model designed to model biological systems across multiple scales, focusing on multicellular interactions and dynamics.

tools.name: UCE
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot foundation model for single-cell gene expression
tools.detailed_description: Universal Cell Embedding (UCE) is a foundation model for single-cell gene expression data that enables zero-shot analysis across diverse cell types and tissues.

tools.name: Tahoe-x1
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell foundation model for gigascale datasets
tools.detailed_description: Tahoe-x1 is a high-performance foundation model optimized for processing and learning from gigascale single-cell datasets.

tools.name: Nicheformer
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for single-cell and spatial omics
tools.detailed_description: Nicheformer is a transformer-based foundation model designed to learn representations from both single-cell and spatial omics data, capturing cellular niches.

tools.name: scConcept
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive pre-training for single-cell representations
tools.detailed_description: scConcept utilizes contrastive learning for pre-training technology-agnostic representations of single-cell data, moving beyond simple reconstruction tasks.

tools.name: Cell2Sentence
tools.one_line_profile: Adapting Large Language Models for biological data
tools.detailed_description: Cell2Sentence transforms single-cell data into sentence-like sequences to leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) for biological analysis and inference.

tools.name: SpaDiT
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Transformer for spatial gene expression prediction
tools.detailed_description: SpaDiT applies Diffusion Transformers to predict spatial gene expression patterns from single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: babel
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for single-cell multi-omic translation
tools.detailed_description: Babel is a deep learning model that infers multi-omic profiles (e.g., RNA to ATAC) from a single input modality in single-cell data.

tools.name: EpiAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for single-cell epigenomic data
tools.detailed_description: EpiAgent is a foundation model specifically designed for analyzing and interpreting single-cell epigenomic data.
